content.raw:
A few outstanding issues with the integration of this branch in ign-gui, which I'm not sure come from here or from `ignition::gui::plugins::Scene3D`:

* When opening multiple cameras to the same scene, the background of one of them has the correct color and all others have a black background
* The plugin doesn't die on shutdown and we need to manually kill it
* We still have no example when the scene is continuously printed to the screen, we only have a fixes camera angle looking at a grid. I'd like to have something continuously painted to be sure that works, it could be mouse orbiting, window resizing(?), or something actually moving in the scene.
